tool_description: Fetches weather forecast and historical weather data including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and solar irradiance for grid forecasting purposes.

location_coordinates.description: Array of latitude and longitude pairs [lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2, ...]

weather_variables.description: Weather variables to fetch: temperature, humidity, wind_speed, solar_irradiance, precipitation

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid forecast horizon: Must be between 1 and 720 hours.
Unsupported weather variable: Use temperature, humidity, wind_speed, solar_irradiance, or precipitation.
Weather service unavailable: External weather API is currently unavailable.
usage: Provide location_coordinates array and forecast_horizon_hours. Optionally specify weather_variables array. Returns weather forecasts for all specified locations and variables.

wind_speed_ms.description: Wind speed in meters per second

solar_irradiance_wm2.description: Solar irradiance in watts per square meter
